column5: Have more pics to save to a CD.How do I do this again?

Pop a blank cd in the drive open up my computer then D:Cd drive open the window where your pictures are that you want to copy to your cd, drag the picture to the d: window, when your done on the left of the d: window should give you the option of buring the images to disc
Reminds me.. I'll burn all your "true love" pictures to one for you Brian. Easier than trying to send them full res! I'll include the videos as well....

yup with most computers that will work with some burners software like nero take over control , if that's the case pop in a blank disc and follow the instructions that will show up on screen and add the photos you want
